name: UTown
directions: Proceed to Level 2, Head to Staircase 3 Landing near the toilets
toiletLocation: Level 2, on the left side after coming out of the staircase

name: EA Male Musollah
directions: Find the lift nearest to Engineering Auditorium
opposite Good News Café and take the lift to the 7th storey.
Next, turn left towards the fire exit and climb the flight of stairs
toiletLocation: On the left side of the lifts

name: EA Female Musollah
directions: Find the lift nearest to LT7A next to Good News Café and
take the lift to the 7th storey.
Next, turn left towards the fire exit
and climb the flight of stairs to reach the musollah
toiletLocation: On the right side of the lifts

name: SDE 3 Female Musollah
directions: From the 2nd storey of the SDE building, take the lift to the 4th storey.
Exit the lift, walk straight and turn right. Walk past the lecture theatres, past the toilet signs and through the passage.
Turn left towards the female toilet and
enter the staircase door. Climb the stairs to reach the musollah

name: SDE 3 Male Musollah
directions: From the 2nd storey of the SDE building, take the lift to the 4th storey.
Exit the lift, walk straight and turn right. Walk past the lecture theatres, past the toilet signs and through the passage.
Turn left towards the male toilet and
enter the staircase door. Climb the stairs to reach the musollah
